channel.title: CVE Feed for Becton Dickinson & Co -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Becton Dickinson & Co -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-30559|2024-08-02T14:28:51.809Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%E2%84%A2%20point-of-care%20unit%20%28pcu%29%20model%208015
item.description: The firmware update package for the wireless card is not properly signed and can be modified.

item.title: CVE-2023-30563|2024-08-02T14:28:51.805Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20systems%20manager
item.description: A malicious file could be uploaded into a System Manager User Import Function resulting in a hijacked session.

item.title: CVE-2023-30562|2024-08-02T14:28:51.621Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20guardrails%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20editor
item.description: A GRE dataset file within Systems Manager can be tampered with and distributed to PCUs.

item.title: CVE-2023-30560|2024-08-02T14:28:51.941Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20point-of-care%20unit%20%28pcu%29%20model%208015
item.description: The configuration from the PCU can be modified without authentication using physical connection to the PCU.

item.title: CVE-2023-30561|2024-08-02T14:28:51.672Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20point-of-care%20unit%20%28pcu%29%20model%208015
item.description: The data flowing between the PCU and its modules is insecure. A threat actor with physical access could potentially read or modify data by attaching a specially crafted device while an infusion is running.

item.title: CVE-2023-30565|2024-08-02T14:28:51.783Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- cqi%20reporter
item.description: An insecure connection between Systems Manager and CQI Reporter application could expose infusion data to an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2023-30564|2024-08-02T14:28:51.639Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%26%20co -- bd%20alaris%C3%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2%20systems%20manager
item.description: Alaris Systems Manager does not perform input validation during the Device Import Function.
